amendment.description: Amendment as modified consists of the text on pages H1969-H1983 in the Congressional Record for April 1, 2004.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part B of House Report 108-456 to make various technical and conforming changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Young (AK) amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
